title: ICE while declaring fixed-sized array depending on the item in the same struct

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
``` rust
struct Generic
{
    pub size: u32,
    pub data: [u32; Generic::ckSize]
}

#[test]
fn it_works() {
}
```

Outputs:
